tool_description: API Returns necessary information from Ebay search page results, such as the price, title, shipping cost and direct url to the product
name: Ebay Search Result
title: Ebay Search Result

api_list.name: Search on ebay
api_list.description: Enter anything you want to search for on Ebay website.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-search-result.p.rapidapi.com/search/iphone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-search-result.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-search-result.p.rapidapi.com/search/{searchquery}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-search-result.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
